Content: Very good with lots of utility. Primary app for shopping but there's a bug when you convert a note to a checklist - I use a Scamsung Galaxy Note8 and the app won't allow me to use the pen to edit checklists after conversion. Crashes when I try to save. Like the app, just needs work.
On an Android 7.1 Moto G5S+ with Nova Launcher Pro the Notification Feature sometimes crashes or doesn't launch at boot.
I love it because it is simple, doesn't take a lot of space, no freeze for my phone, it is has beautiful colors that motivates me to write more notes.
Does what it says on the tin, only minor complaint is that there's a bug that makes the app crash whenever you want to copy-paste something. Great app other then that.
